name: Pray (Satyam Bhatt, Anay Kharade, Nikhil T, Omkar Pardeshi)
name_original: Pray (Satyam Bhatt, Anay Kharade, Nikhil T, Omkar Pardeshi)
description:
A puzzle platformer about a cat finding her way through the world. Please join her journey through this mysterious land and find out the wonders that present themselves.

Do not press 'G' .

Try saying "Hello" or "Meow" if you have a microphone.

Controls:

"A" and "D" to move

"Space" to jump

"Left Shift" to Dash

"Left Mouse Button" to shoot.

thank you!
